This website describes the Massachusetts Data Science Pathways project.

The organization is intended for Massachusetts educators and other stakeholders focused on data science pathways from high school through two- and four- colleges and universities.

## Resources

- [DSC-WAV project](http://dsc-wav.github.io/www/)
- [Two Year College Data Science Summit](https://www.amstat.org/ASA/Education/Two-Year-College-Data-Science-Summit.aspx)
- [Data Science for Undergraduates (NASEM 2018)](https://nas.edu/envisioningds)
- [NASEM Roundtable on Data Science Postsecondary Education](https://www.nationalacademies.org/event/06-12-2019/roundtable-on-data-science-postsecondary-education-meeting-11)

Thanks to NSF grant 1923388 for support of the DSC-WAV project.
